title: "Changing Perception: Three Approaches Explained"
first_phrase: In the previous section, the concept of changing perception through effective intervention was discussed. Continuing on this topic, this part explores three ways to create such changes in perception. The example of changing the perception of the unpleasant odor of sweat to a pleasing one is used. The three approaches are listed in order of increasing depth of intervention. The authors of these concepts and techniques are not mentioned by name.
content: Alucinaciones con referente interno: se cambia la percepción del olor de sudor frío y pasa de ser" desagradable " a " agradable " o incluso" delicioso ", simplemente dando instrucciones adecuadas al subconsciente: el olor continua siendo el mismo, solo el juicio estético y emotivo relativo a la percepción de un determinado olor cambia con respecto a lo que manifestaba el sujeto antes del trabajo de trance de sonambulístico. 3.
last_phrase: In conclusion, while it is possible to alter one's perception of a particular scent through hypnosis, it is important to approach such changes carefully and with caution. It is not always the recommended method for achieving a deeper level of transformation.
